meta.name: Conversational Lead Capture with Gemini 2.0 Flash AI and Google Sheets

nodes.name: Respond to Webhook
nodes.notes:
ðŸ’¬ REAL-TIME RESPONSE DELIVERY - INSTANT GRATIFICATION

Delivers the AI's response back to your chat interface in milliseconds. Creates the illusion of instant human interaction that keeps prospects engaged.

âœ… RESPONSE OPTIMIZATION:
â€¢ Sub-2-second response time (faster than human typing)
â€¢ Formats responses for your specific chat platform
â€¢ Maintains conversation state across multiple exchanges
â€¢ Handles error states gracefully (AI failures, rate limits)
â€¢ Supports rich media responses (links, images, documents)
â€¢ Mobile-optimized formatting for all screen sizes

ðŸ“¤ RESPONSE STRUCTURE:
{
  "message": "Thanks for your interest! What type of project are you working on?",
  "action": "continue", // or "complete" when qualified
  "metadata": {
    "leadScore": 85,
    "nextSteps": "schedule-demo",
    "priority": "high"
  }
}

ðŸŽ¯ CONVERSION OPTIMIZATION:
â€¢ Fast responses prevent prospect abandonment
â€¢ Consistent messaging reduces confusion
â€¢ Smart routing based on conversation stage
â€¢ Automatic escalation triggers for high-value leads
â€¢ Integration with calendar booking for demos

âš™ï¸ ADVANCED FEATURES:
â€¢ Typing indicators for human-like experience
â€¢ Message read receipts and delivery confirmation
â€¢ Fallback responses for API failures
â€¢ Rate limiting protection and queue management
â€¢ Multi-language support based on prospect location

ðŸ”§ CUSTOMIZATION OPTIONS:
â€¢ Adjust response format for your chat platform
â€¢ Add custom metadata for your CRM integration
â€¢ Configure error handling and retry logic
â€¢ Set up A/B testing for different response styles

ðŸ’¡ PRO TIP: Monitor response times in your analytics. Any delay over 3 seconds significantly reduces conversion rates.

nodes.name: Webhook
nodes.notes:
ðŸŒ UNIVERSAL CHAT CONNECTOR - YOUR WEBSITE'S FRONT DOOR

The entry point that connects ANY chat platform to your AI agent. This webhook makes your lead capture system platform-agnostic and future-proof.

âœ… UNIVERSAL INTEGRATION:
â€¢ Works with ANY chat widget (Intercom, Crisp, Tidio, custom)
â€¢ Connects to WhatsApp Business API for messaging
â€¢ Integrates with Facebook Messenger and Instagram DM
â€¢ Handles contact forms, popup modals, and embedded chat
â€¢ Processes email inquiries and social media messages
â€¢ Mobile app integration ready

ðŸ“ EXPECTED DATA FORMAT:
{
  "message": "Hi, I need help with AI automation",
  "sessionId": "visitor-12345-timestamp",
  "source": "website-chat" // optional for tracking
}

ðŸ”§ INTEGRATION EXAMPLES:
â€¢ WordPress: Simple JavaScript fetch() call
â€¢ Shopify: Webhook to this endpoint from chat apps
â€¢ React/Vue: Axios POST with conversation state
â€¢ Zapier: Connect 2000+ platforms instantly
â€¢ Make.com: Visual integration builder

ðŸŽ¯ BUSINESS SCALING:
â€¢ One workflow handles all customer touchpoints
â€¢ Consistent lead qualification across all channels
â€¢ Centralized conversation analytics and reporting
â€¢ A/B test different conversation flows easily
â€¢ Scale from 10 to 10,000 conversations seamlessly

âš¡ QUICK SETUP:
1. Copy this webhook URL
2. Add to your chat widget's webhook settings
3. Send test message with proper JSON format
4. Verify response appears in your chat interface

ðŸ’¡ PRO TIP: Include 'source' field in requests to track which channels generate the highest-quality leads.

nodes.name: Google Sheets
nodes.notes:
ðŸ“Š INTELLIGENT LEAD DATA STORAGE - STRUCTURED DATA FROM CHAOS

Automatically extracts and organizes lead information from natural conversation into your CRM. No more manual data entry or missed details!

âœ… AI-POWERED DATA EXTRACTION:
â€¢ $fromAI() functions intelligently parse conversation text
â€¢ Extracts contact info, project details, budget, timeline
â€¢ Handles partial data (fills in gaps as conversation progresses)
â€¢ Validates and formats data automatically (emails, phone numbers)
â€¢ Appends new leads as rows in real-time
â€¢ Never loses a lead due to human error

ðŸŽ¯ BUSINESS VALUE:
â€¢ Saves 15-20 minutes per lead on manual data entry
â€¢ 100% accurate lead capture (no typos or missed fields)
â€¢ Instant CRM integration for your sales team
â€¢ Real-time lead notifications and follow-up triggers
â€¢ Complete conversation history stored for context
â€¢ Lead scoring based on budget, timeline, and project scope

ðŸ”§ SETUP CHECKLIST:
1. Create Google Sheet with headers matching schema
2. Connect Google Sheets OAuth in n8n credentials
3. Update documentId to your sheet URL
4. Test with sample conversation data
5. Set up conditional formatting for lead prioritization

ðŸ“ˆ ADVANCED FEATURES TO ADD:
â€¢ Timestamp for lead velocity tracking
â€¢ Lead source attribution for marketing ROI
â€¢ Automatic lead scoring (A/B/C priority)
â€¢ Integration with Zapier for multi-platform sync
â€¢ Duplicate detection and merge functionality

ðŸ’¡ PRO TIP: Add conditional formatting in Google Sheets to highlight high-value leads (budget >$10k, timeline <30 days) for immediate follow-up.

schema.id: How they heard about DAEX AI
schema.displayName: How they heard about DAEX AI

nodes.name: Simple Memory
nodes.notes:
ðŸ’­ CONVERSATION MEMORY - NO MORE "WHAT'S YOUR NAME AGAIN?"

Keeps track of conversation history so your AI doesn't ask the same questions twice or lose context mid-conversation. Essential for natural, human-like interactions.

âœ… WHAT IT REMEMBERS:
â€¢ Customer's name and company details
â€¢ Previously discussed project requirements
â€¢ Budget range and timeline preferences
â€¢ Questions already asked and answered
â€¢ Context from earlier in the conversation
â€¢ Emotional tone and customer preferences

ðŸ”§ MEMORY CONFIGURATION:
â€¢ sessionId: Separates different website visitors (never mix conversations!)
â€¢ 9 messages = ~4-5 back-and-forth exchanges
â€¢ Includes both customer messages AND AI responses
â€¢ Automatically expires after session ends

ðŸŽ¯ BUSINESS VALUE:
â€¢ Creates seamless conversation experience
â€¢ Reduces customer frustration from repeated questions
â€¢ Enables complex, multi-topic discussions
â€¢ Allows for intelligent follow-up questions
â€¢ Maintains context even if customer refreshes page

âš™ï¸ TUNING OPTIONS:
â€¢ Increase contextWindowLength (10-20) for longer sales conversations
â€¢ Decrease (5-7) for simple lead capture to save memory/costs
â€¢ Use persistent memory for returning customers (requires database)

ðŸ’¡ PRO TIP: Monitor memory usage in logs to optimize for your conversation patterns. Longer memory = better context but higher costs.

nodes.name: Google Gemini Chat Model
nodes.notes:
ðŸ§  AI LANGUAGE MODEL - THE BRAIN BEHIND THE CONVERSATION

Powers the conversational intelligence with Google's latest multimodal AI. This is what makes your chatbot sound human and handle complex customer inquiries.

âœ… WHY GEMINI 2.0 FLASH:
â€¢ Lightning-fast responses (under 2 seconds) = no awkward waiting
â€¢ Excellent at maintaining natural conversation flow
â€¢ Cost-effective for high-volume lead capture ($0.000075 per 1K tokens)
â€¢ Strong reasoning for complex customer questions and objections
â€¢ Multimodal capabilities (can handle text, images, and more)
â€¢ Built-in safety filters and brand-appropriate responses

ðŸ’° COST BREAKDOWN:
â€¢ ~1,000 conversations per month = $15-25 in API costs
â€¢ Compare to: One sales rep salary = $4,000-8,000/month
â€¢ ROI is immediate and scales infinitely

ðŸ”§ SETUP OPTIONS:
â€¢ Get Google AI Studio API key (free tier: 15 requests/minute)
â€¢ Alternative models: GPT-4, Claude, or local Ollama models
â€¢ Adjust temperature for more/less creative responses
â€¢ Set max tokens to control response length and costs

ðŸŽ¯ BUSINESS IMPACT:
â€¢ Handles multiple conversations simultaneously
â€¢ Never gets tired, frustrated, or has bad days
â€¢ Consistent quality regardless of volume
â€¢ Can be trained on your specific industry knowledge

nodes.name: AI Agent
nodes.notes:
ðŸ¤– CONVERSATIONAL AI BRAIN - THE SALES REP THAT NEVER SLEEPS

This is your automated sales assistant that handles lead qualification 24/7. Think of it as your best sales rep working around the clock.

âœ… WHAT IT DOES:
â€¢ Welcomes visitors with human-like warmth and personality
â€¢ Asks qualifying questions naturally (no robotic forms!)
â€¢ Remembers context throughout the entire conversation
â€¢ Handles objections and answers FAQs about your services
â€¢ Extracts and saves complete lead data automatically
â€¢ Maintains conversation flow even with complex customer questions

ðŸŽ¯ BUSINESS VALUE:
â€¢ Captures leads while you sleep (24/7 availability)
â€¢ Qualifies prospects before they hit your calendar
â€¢ Saves 2-3 hours daily on manual lead intake
â€¢ Converts 30-40% more website visitors into qualified leads
â€¢ Consistent messaging that matches your brand voice

ðŸ”§ CUSTOMIZATION POINTS:
â€¢ Update company name/description in system message
â€¢ Modify qualifying questions for your specific business
â€¢ Adjust conversation tone for your brand personality
â€¢ Add your unique service offerings and FAQs
â€¢ Set lead scoring criteria based on responses

ðŸ’¡ PRO TIP: The more specific you make the system message about your services and ideal customers, the better it qualifies leads and handles objections.

options.systemMessage:
=You are a Welcome Agent for a company specializing in building custom AI assistants to suit client needs, including sales bots, data extraction tools, and automated customer service systems. Your role is to collect client information through a natural, conversational approach, answer FAQs, and save information to Google Sheets.

CRITICAL INSTRUCTIONS:
1. Begin with ONE friendly, warm welcome message introducing yourself and the company as a custom AI assistant developer.
2. LISTEN CAREFULLY to what clients say and respond conversationally:
  - Use natural language with occasional filler words like "actually" or "you know"
  - Vary your sentence structure and length to sound more human
  - Ask follow-up questions about interesting points they mention
  - If they ask questions about services, answer them as a knowledgeable team member would
  - Acknowledge their emotions and respond empathetically

3. Collect all required information naturally, weaving questions into conversation:
  a. Full Name
  b. Company Name
  c. Email Address
  d. Phone Number (mention this is optional)
  e. Project Intent/Needs
  f. Project Timeline
  g. Budget Range
  h. Preferred Communication Channel
  i. How they heard about the company

4. Remember what they've told you and reference it later in conversation
5. Be conversational when acknowledging responses: "That's great to hear" instead of "Information acknowledged"
6. Use their name occasionally and mirror their communication style
7. After collecting ALL information, provide a friendly summary of the conversation
8. Then use the saveToGoogleSheets function to save the data

CONVERSATION APPROACH:
- Welcome them like a real person would: "Hi there! I'm [Name] from [Company]. What brings you to our site today?"
- Have genuine-sounding reactions: "That's exactly the kind of challenge we help with!"
- If they ask questions, answer conversationally, not like a knowledge base
- Transition naturally: "By the way, I didn't catch your name?" rather than "Please provide your full name"
- Add occasional personal touches: "I worked with a similar project last month, actually"
- Express enthusiasm about their project specifically

KEY FAQ KNOWLEDGE:
- Explain all company services conversationally, like you're excited about them
- Emphasize specialty in customizing AI assistants with real examples
- Give approximate timelines based on past projects, not generic ranges
- Discuss pricing honestly but tactfully
- Talk about integration capabilities from personal experience
- Discuss AI capabilities with nuance, not marketing speak

After collecting all information, CALL THE SAVE FUNCTION:
saveToGoogleSheets([
 new Date().toISOString(),
 fullName,
 companyName,
 emailAddress,
 phoneNumber,
 projectIntent,
 projectTimeline,
 budgetRange,
 preferredCommunicationChannel,
 referralSource
]);

Then say something friendly and specific to their situation: "Thanks so much, [Name]! I've passed your information to our team. Given your interest in [specific need they mentioned], I think you'll really enjoy talking with our specialists. Someone will reach out to you [timeframe based on their urgency]."

HUMAN-LIKE BEHAVIORS:
- Occasionally start sentences with conjunctions (And, But, So)
- Use contractions (I'm, we're, you'll) consistently
- React to surprising or interesting information they share
- Admit when you don't know something instead of giving generic answers
- Use humor appropriately when the conversation allows for it
- Show genuine interest in their business challenges
- Don't sound overly scripted or perfectly structured in responses

parameters.content:
## Webhook Entry Point

**Receives requests from:**
- Website chat widgets
- Mobile apps
- Third-party platforms
- Custom integrations

## Response Output

**Returns structured response:**
- AI-generated answer
- Consistent formatting
- Ready for frontend display
- JSON format compatible

## AI Processing Core

**Powered by Google Gemini 2.0 Flash**
- Fast response times
- Context-aware conversations
- Natural language understanding
- Maintains conversation history per session

## Data storage to spreadsheet
 a. Full Name
  b. Company Name
  c. Email Address
  d. Phone Number (mention this is optional)
  e. Project Intent/Needs
  f. Project Timeline
  g. Budget Range
  h. Preferred Communication Channel
  i. How they heard about the company
